Title: Search Functionality - Verify multiple filters intersection
Description: Test that searching with multiple filters (Job Title, Status, Date range) returns correct intersection of records as per FR-1 and FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Select 'Software Engineer' from Job Title dropdown | Select 'Interviewed' from Status dropdown | Set Date of Application From to '2023-01-01' and To to '2023-01-31' | Click Search
Expected Results: Only candidates who match all three criteria are displayed in the table.

Title: Search Functionality - Verify Keywords filter
Description: Test that searching with Keywords filter returns correct records as per FR-1 and FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Enter 'Java' in Keywords field | Click Search
Expected Results: Only candidates with 'Java' skill keyword are displayed.

Title: Search Functionality - Verify Method of Application filter
Description: Test that searching with Method of Application filter returns correct records as per FR-1 and FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Select 'LinkedIn' from Method of Application dropdown | Click Search
Expected Results: Only candidates who applied via LinkedIn are displayed.

Title: Search Functionality - Verify Status filter
Description: Test that searching with Status filter returns correct records as per FR-1 and FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Select 'Interviewed' from Status dropdown | Click Search
Expected Results: Only candidates with status 'Interviewed' are displayed.

Title: Search Functionality - Verify Date of Application range filter
Description: Test that searching with Date of Application range returns correct records as per FR-1 and FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Set Date of Application From to '2023-01-01' and To to '2023-01-31' | Click Search
Expected Results: Only candidates who applied between 1 Jan 2023 and 31 Jan 2023 are displayed.

Title: Search Functionality - Verify Candidate Name filter
Description: Test that searching with Candidate Name filter returns correct records as per FR-1 and FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Enter 'John Doe' in Candidate Name field | Click Search
Expected Results: Only candidates whose name contains 'John Doe' are displayed in the table.

Title: Search Functionality - Verify Job Title filter
Description: Test that searching with Job Title filter returns correct records as per FR-1 and FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Select 'Software Engineer' from Job Title dropdown | Click Search
Expected Results: Only candidates with the job title 'Software Engineer' are displayed in the table.

Title: Sorting - Verify Candidate column descending sort
Description: Test that sorting the Candidate column in descending order works as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the Candidate column header twice
Expected Results: The table data is sorted by Candidate name in descending order.

Title: Sorting - Verify Candidate column ascending sort
Description: Test that sorting the Candidate column in ascending order works as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the Candidate column header once
Expected Results: The table data is sorted by Candidate name in ascending order.

Title: Sorting - Verify Vacancy column descending sort
Description: Test that sorting the Vacancy column in descending order works as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the Vacancy column header twice
Expected Results: The table data is sorted by Vacancy in descending order.

Title: Sorting - Verify Vacancy column ascending sort
Description: Test that sorting the Vacancy column in ascending order works as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the Vacancy column header once
Expected Results: The table data is sorted by Vacancy in ascending order.

Title: Bulk Selection - Verify select all functionality
Description: Test that selecting the bulk selection checkbox selects all rows as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the master checkbox in the table header
Expected Results: All candidate rows are selected and each row's checkbox is checked.

Title: Add Candidate - Verify + Add button navigation
Description: Test that the '+ Add' button is present and navigates to the Add Candidate form as per FR-7.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the '+ Add' button
Expected Results: The system navigates to the Add Candidate form page.

Title: Candidate Actions - Verify Delete cancellation
Description: Test that canceling the delete confirmation does not remove the record as per FR-6.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the Delete icon for a candidate record | Cancel deletion in the confirmation dialog
Expected Results: The candidate record remains in the table and the record count is unchanged.

Title: Candidate Actions - Verify Delete icon functionality
Description: Test that clicking the Delete icon prompts confirmation and deletes the record upon confirmation as per FR-6.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the Delete icon for a candidate record | Confirm deletion in the confirmation dialog
Expected Results: The candidate record is removed from the table and the record count decreases by one.

Title: Candidate Actions - Verify Download icon functionality
Description: Test that clicking the Download icon initiates the download of the candidate's resume/application documents as per FR-6.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the Download icon for a candidate record
Expected Results: The system initiates a file download of the candidate's resume/application documents.

Title: Candidate Actions - Verify View icon functionality
Description: Test that clicking the View icon opens the candidate's detailed profile as per FR-6.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click the View icon for a candidate record
Expected Results: A detailed view of the candidate's profile opens in a modal or new page.

Title: Candidate Actions - Verify presence of View, Download, Delete icons
Description: Test that each candidate record has View, Download, and Delete icons as per FR-6.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Locate a candidate record in the table
Expected Results: The Actions column for the record displays three icons: eye (View), download, and delete.

Title: Table Columns - Verify Actions column non-sortable
Description: Test that the Actions column is non-sortable as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Attempt to click the Actions column header
Expected Results: The Actions column header does not trigger any sorting action.

Title: Table Columns - Verify sortable columns
Description: Test that the table displays all required columns and that Vacancy, Candidate, Hiring Manager, Date of Application, and Status columns are sortable as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Verify table headers for Vacancy, Candidate, Hiring Manager, Date of Application, Status | Click each sortable column header
Expected Results: Each sortable column header is present and clicking it sorts the table data accordingly.

Title: Record Count Display - Verify number of records found
Description: Test that the number of records found is displayed correctly after a search as per FR-4.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Perform a search with known criteria that returns 10 records | Observe the record count display
Expected Results: The record count display shows '(10) Records Found' accurately reflecting the number of records returned.

Title: Reset Functionality - Verify Reset button clears filters
Description: Test that clicking the Reset button clears all filter fields and returns the record list to its default state as per FR-3.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Enter values in multiple filter fields | Click the Reset button
Expected Results: All filter fields are cleared, the search/filter section shows default values, and the candidate list displays all records.

Title: Search Functionality - Verify Search button initiates search
Description: Test that clicking the Search button initiates a search and displays records as per FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Enter any valid filter criteria (e.g., Job Title: 'Software Engineer') | Click the Search button
Expected Results: The system performs a search based on the entered criteria and displays the matching candidate records in the table.

Title: Search & Filter Section - Verify expandable functionality
Description: Test that the search/filter section can be expanded and fields are visible as per FR-1.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click on the collapsible arrow to expand the search/filter section
Expected Results: The search/filter section expands and all filter fields are visible.

Title: Search & Filter Section - Verify collapsible functionality
Description: Test that the search/filter section can be collapsed and fields are hidden as per FR-1.
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates tab | Click on the collapsible arrow to collapse the search/filter section
Expected Results: The search/filter section collapses and all filter fields (Job Title, Vacancy, Hiring Manager, Status, Candidate Name, Keywords, Date of Application, Method of Application) are hidden from view.
